joxy

Class JoxyTableHeaderUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.TableHeaderUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTableHeaderUI
          • joxy.JoxyTableHeaderUI

  • public class JoxyTableHeaderUI
extends BasicTableHeaderUI
    Joxy's UI delegate for the JTableHeader.

    The paint methods are overridden to let the table header look more KDE-like.

    Author:
    Thom Castermans, Willem Sonke

        Parameters:
        g2 - The Graphics2D object to paint with.
        c - The JTableHeader object to paint the columns for.
